revised_title: On Singular Points and Lines in the Theory of Loci of Ultimate Intersections of a System of Surfaces
tldr: The author investigates the properties of singular points and lines in the context of the theory of loci of ultimate intersections of a system of surfaces. The study focuses on rational and integral equations and their factors, which are connected to the envelope, conic node, biplanar node, and uniplanar node loci.
